column4: lardarse>> i pressed alt+f2 and it says run application and i checked the box run in terminal and i typed in lspci but nothing comes up
then in the alt-f2 box, type gnome-terminal, and then type lspci in the terminal window that pops up
paste the output to pastebin http://paste.ubuntu.com and then ask the person who told you to type in lspci what to do next
